name: icebox-cpps-launcher-app
description: Icebox Launcher is a lightweight Electron wrapper and launcher/manager for all your favourite CPPS servers with a polished in-app toolbar, customizable hotkeys, and universal macOS builds (with support for other OS coming soon).

scripts.mac: node -e "const v=require('./package.json').version; console.log('\x1b[1m\x1b[43m\x1b[30m üõ†Ô∏è BUILDING icebox_v'+v+'-macos_universal... ==========' + '\x1b[0m')" && electron-builder --mac --universal
